title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: I will make a warning that this is a new coin and may turn out to be another scam like Novasol (XNS), but we are only talking about mining and you yourself assess the risksWebsitehttps://gamepass.networkPoolhttp://pool.gamepass.networkDiscordhttps://discord.gg/8TSkNhaDpSMining is the process of generating new GPN coins by solving complex mathematical problems using your computer’s power. Mining secures the Gamepass Network and ensures its decentralization. Anyone can become a miner and join the Gamepass Network community. All you need is a compatible GPU and a mining software that supports the KaWPoW algorithm. You can find a list of recommended mining software on our website. You also need to download the official Gamepass Network wallet to store and manage your GPN coins. The initial block reward is 2000 GPN coins, of which the miner receives 51% for keeping the chain secure. The block reward decreases by 1% every month due to our custom halving algorithm. Mining is a great way to support the Gamepass Network and earn GPN coins while doing so.

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on May 03, 2023, 12:45:16 PMI will make a warning that this is a new coin and may turn out to be another scam like Novasol (XNS), but we are only talking about mining and you yourself assess the risksI mean that its nice and good that you want to give other Users and people some warning about new Projects and Coins.But :The Mining Board is and should be only for and about Mining Software and related things for mining AltcoinsFor Warnings and proof of things that a Coin or Project is a Scam we have explicit the Scam Accusations Board for thatThere you can create a Topic for with all the details and why you think that it is a possible ScamIf you think that this is or will be a Scam why posting all the Links for the Project included the pool and all ?I would not posting the Links to the pool and also to the Discord as with that the chance is even more bigger that Users get scammed.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Lafu on May 03, 2023, 01:23:47 PMQuote from: FP91G on May 03, 2023, 12:45:16 PMI will make a warning that this is a new coin and may turn out to be another scam like Novasol (XNS), but we are only talking about mining and you yourself assess the risksI mean that its nice and good that you want to give other Users and people some warning about new Projects and Coins.But :The Mining Board is and should be only for and about Mining Software and related things for mining AltcoinsFor Warnings and proof of things that a Coin or Project is a Scam we have explicit the Scam Accusations Board for thatThere you can create a Topic for with all the details and why you think that it is a possible ScamIf you think that this is or will be a Scam why posting all the Links for the Project included the pool and all ?I would not posting the Links to the pool and also to the Discord as with that the chance is even more bigger that Users get scammed.I checked the links before posting. There is nothing suspicious on the mining pool and the KaWPoW coin algorithm is not new. The only thing that a miner can lose is to get some altcoins that cannot be sold. These are adequate risks for the miner that everyone knows about, but I decided to make a warning.I will keep an eye on the development of the project, and may remove the warning after a while. Further I will discuss only mining.

comments.author: CryptoGrizzly
comments.body: I might give it a try but I am not a fan of KaWPoW. Uses to much electricity for my taste.

comments.author: chup
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on May 03, 2023, 12:45:16 PMThe initial block reward is 2000 GPN coins, of which the miner receives 51% for keeping the chain secure. The block reward decreases by 1% every month due to our custom halving algorithm. Mining is a great way to support the Gamepass Network and earn GPN coins while doing so.[/i]Read: Mining is a great way to fulfill someone's greedy dreams with rest 49% of the block reward.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGrizzly on May 06, 2023, 11:32:15 PMI might give it a try but I am not a fan of KaWPoW. Uses to much electricity for my taste.YOU are right, in the summer this is a bad algorithm for video cards, and if there are other coins for mining, then it is better not to mine hot coins.

The block reward decreases by 1% every month due to our custom halving algorithm. Mining is a great way to support the Gamepass Network and earn GPN coins while doing so.[/i]Read: Mining is a great way to fulfill someone's greedy dreams with rest 49% of the block reward. This is crazy for sure.

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGrizzly on May 07, 2023, 01:01:04 PMQuote from: chup on May 07, 2023, 06:06:30 AMQuote from: FP91G on May 03, 2023, 12:45:16 PMThe initial block reward is 2000 GPN coins, of which the miner receives 51% for keeping the chain secure. The block reward decreases by 1% every month due to our custom halving algorithm. Mining is a great way to support the Gamepass Network and earn GPN coins while doing so.[/i]Read: Mining is a great way to fulfill someone's greedy dreams with rest 49% of the block reward. This is crazy for sure. This is a big commission. 10-20% on the team's budget and project development looks good if the project does not have funding. When almost half of the coins are taken from miners, the interest of miners in such a coin quickly disappears.

comments.author: crsminer
comments.body: Quote from: safar1980 on May 07, 2023, 01:13:28 PMQuote from: CryptoGrizzly on May 07, 2023, 01:01:04 PMQuote from: chup on May 07, 2023, 06:06:30 AMQuote from: FP91G on May 03, 2023, 12:45:16 PMThe initial block reward is 2000 GPN coins, of which the miner receives 51% for keeping the chain secure. The block reward decreases by 1% every month due to our custom halving algorithm. Mining is a great way to support the Gamepass Network and earn GPN coins while doing so.[/i]Read: Mining is a great way to fulfill someone's greedy dreams with rest 49% of the block reward. This is crazy for sure. This is a big commission. 10-20% on the team's budget and project development looks good if the project does not have funding. When almost half of the coins are taken from miners, the interest of miners in such a coin quickly disappears.It's not 10-20% for them. They have a PoG system right now on Dota2 it seems. From the whitepaper:"NetworkThe Gamepass Network runs on its own cryptocurrency called the GPN coin (GPN). GPN is aproof-of-work coin that uses the KawPow algorithm to protect against ASIC miners. GPN has atotal supply of 8.75 billion coins, which are distributed as follows:- 51% to miners who protect the network by generating blocks;- 41% to gamers who play games on the Gamepass Network;- 8% to developers who maintain and improve the Gamepass Network.GPN has a unique halving algorithm that reduces the block reward by 1% each month.In this whitepaper, we will describe in more detail the features, architecture, roadmap, team,legal aspects, and risks of the Gamepass Network."

comments.author: FP91G

This is crazy for sure. This is a big commission. 10-20% on the team's budget and project development looks good if the project does not have funding. When almost half of the coins are taken from miners, the interest of miners in such a coin quickly disappears.It's not 10-20% for them. They have a PoG system right now on Dota2 it seems. From the whitepaper:"NetworkThe Gamepass Network runs on its own cryptocurrency called the GPN coin (GPN). GPN is aproof-of-work coin that uses the KawPow algorithm to protect against ASIC miners. GPN has atotal supply of 8.75 billion coins, which are distributed as follows:- 51% to miners who protect the network by generating blocks;- 41% to gamers who play games on the Gamepass Network;- 8% to developers who maintain and improve the Gamepass Network.GPN has a unique halving algorithm that reduces the block reward by 1% each month.In this whitepaper, we will describe in more detail the features, architecture, roadmap, team,legal aspects, and risks of the Gamepass Network."For winning a random game Dota 2 you get 2000 GamePass coins!you need to set up an account.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W92PiWv9Ukg&ab_channel=UsmfoxIt's not much, $1.5 for 40 minutes if you win, but if you play DOTA 2 because you like it, then you will have a nice little bonus.If the world of tanks paid the same, I would play.

comments.author: Dank14
comments.body: I'm wondering if it will be okay to mine gamepass coin using GPU from Amazon Web Services AWS

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Dank14 on June 02, 2023, 08:56:57 AMI'm wondering if it will be okay to mine gamepass coin using GPU from Amazon Web Services AWS  Microsoft, Google, Amazon Web Services will ban mining on their services. If you use their servers to install software that will play games for you and get rewards for being active in games, then I think you will succeed.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Gaming and getting rewarded in the Gamepass Network is fun and easy. You just need to play popular games like Dota2 and PUBG. You can earn GPN coins based on your game statistics and performance. You can also buy and sell game assets on the future marketplace with GPN coins. Join the Gamepass Network community and start gaming today!https://gamepass.network/x3 pumphttps://gamepass.network/

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Important news on Discord"Hi allIt is with deep regret that we have to inform you that one of the founders of our GPN project, known to us as G, has disappeared. In addition, more than $50,000 was stolen.We all work together on the basis of complete trust and there is no way we could have foreseen this situation. Unfortunately, we were unable to contact G after the withdrawal and we still do not know the exact reason for his disappearance. Perhaps the funds were vital to him.This news came as an unpleasant surprise to us, but we want to assure you that our responsibility for the project remains unchanged.We are forced to continue raising funds by adding the developer's share received from each new block, which consists of a development fund and developer salaries. Thus, the MEXC listed fund will receive 49% of the daily issuance. Funds withheld from GameFund will be treated as a loan.After listing on the MEXC exchange, we will begin to burn the developers' share until the loan amount is repaid in full. Combustion processes will be announced later.We have some assets in the development fund, both GPN and USDT. However, using them to cover losses will be irrational, since this will not cover even a significant part of the losses. Thus, these funds will only be used to maintain the operation of servers and equipment, while the developer's shares will be burned.We are conducting a security audit now and in the next few days.We will have to launch additional rounds of over-the-counter sales to recover the USD amount. We will announce new rounds of OTC sales at a later date."https://t.me/journalmainera/3005
